alert.note: Alert for Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 12:12PM PST until February 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Lowlands of western Whatcom County, including Point Roberts, Lummi Island, Bellingham, and Sumas and Lowlands of western Skagit County, including Cypress Island, Guemes Island, Anacortes, Mount Vernon, and La Conner. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Local accumulations up to 8 inches near the Canadian Border and over higher terrain near the Cascades.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County
